question: Read the statements about Nehru Yuva Kendra Sangathan, and choose the correct one. 1. Nehru Yuva Kendras was established in 1972. 2.It is an autonomous organization under Ministry of Youth Affairs and Sports.
explanation: Nehru Yuva Kendras was established in 1972.In 1987, Rajiv Gandhi Government made it Nehru Yuva Kendra Sangathan. It is an autonomous organization under Ministry of Youth Affairs and Sports.
